archimate:Requirement.name: SA.1.5.7: Single Sign On (SSO) or other authentication management tools (e.g. password vaults) should be used to reduce the amount of authentication information that users are required to remember (and protect).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
